news.title: Ukrainians in war-ravaged Donbas weigh prospects of peace deal
news.summary: While many Ukrainians believe they have sacrificed too much for their country to lose territory to Russia, others are desperate for the war to end.

news.title: 'We will never get justice,' say Hillsborough families as report finds fundamental police failures
news.summary: A report finds 12 ex-police officers would have faced gross misconduct cases over the disaster under today's laws.

news.title: Jury trials scrapped for crimes with sentences of less than three years
news.summary: The reforms are being brought in to tackle unprecedented delays in the Crown Court.

news.title: Quarter of police forces lack basic policies on sexual offences, Sarah Everard inquiry finds
news.summary: The report, four years after the 33-year-old's murder, says urgent action is needed to prevent violent, sexual attacks against women.

news.title: Andrew won't get any money back after Royal Lodge move
news.summary: MPs announce an inquiry into the Crown Estate and its properties after Andrew's departure from Windsor.

news.title: Friends to leave Netflix in UK at the end of the year
news.summary: The comedy, which is one of the streamer's most popular shows, will leave the platform on 30 December.

news.title: Cost of unregistered children's care homes a national scandal, says Ofsted
news.summary: The Children's Homes Association says there is no clear national plan and government must 'fix the system'.

news.title: Holly Willoughby fined Â£1,600 for careless driving
news.summary: The TV presenter drove her Mini Cooper without due care and attention near her home in Richmond.

news.title: Reeves speech did not mislead on challenges facing UK ahead of Budget, says OBR official
news.summary: Prof David Miles tells MPs the messaging given by the chancellor was "not inconsistent" with the situation she faced.

news.title: Briton Arvid Lindblad, 18, to make Formula 1 debut in 2026
news.summary: Red Bull will promote Isack Hadjar to their senior team and hand Briton Arvid Lindblad, 18, a debut Formula 1 season in 2026.
